title: LOL: Chi ride è fuori
overview: In the first season of LOL, 10 comedians - Caterina Guzzanti, Frank Matano, Elio, Lillo, Katia Follesa, Angelo Pintus, Ciro and Fru from The Jackal, Michela Giraud and Luca Ravenna - face off for six hours in a row to keep a straight face, trying everything to make their opponents laugh. Whoever makes it to the end wins €100,000 to turn over to charity.
